title: Team Quest looking for Coach and players.
body:
Team Quest wants to find a coach who will work with the team on the following things

1. Pick/Ban
2. Player development
3. Team Macro
4. Vod reviews

We are also looking for subs (Plat V Solo/Duo) for every role except mid. Add me via client or respond here if interested.

replies.body: I should have clarified all positions are unpaid. We compete in OoL and SumSoc series currently and neither is advance enough to warrant pay.
Hey I'm looking to coach you my main is farmacide and I can defidently help you
